item.title: About
item.description: Origin of the Website Name “Ming Zefei (明泽飞)” was my nickname during middle school, derived from “Yueyang Tower Notes”: “The spring is mild and the scenery is bright, the waves are calm without disturbance, the light from above and below, all is one vast expanse of blue.” Sometimes I also rewrite it as “Ming Zefei (明则非
